game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the Forbidden Temple
game.description: Legend speaks of a powerful artifact hidden deep within the Forbidden Temple. Brave adventurers are needed to embark on a perilous journey to recover this priceless treasure.

task.objective: Find the entrance to the Forbidden Temple
task.description: Inquire with the local villagers about the rumored location of the temple.

task.objective: Obtain the key to the Forbidden Temple
task.description: Slay the guardian monster and retrieve it at the Dark Forest entrance.

task.objective: Navigate treacherous traps within the temple
task.description: Be careful of hidden traps and solve ancient riddles at Forbidden Temple.

task.objective: Face the ancient guardian and retrieve the artifact
task.description: Battle the guardian in the Chamber of the Guardian and claim the artifact.
